description: This file is a TypeScript configuration file for ESLint, setting up linting rules for a Vue.js project using TypeScript and Vitest. It imports various plugin configurations, defines specific file inclusion and exclusion patterns, and exports the combined configuration via `defineConfigWithVueTs`.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Main function to define ESLint configuration with Vue and TypeScript support using provided configuration objects.
